title: Emerald Lakshmi Kasu Haaram with South Sea Pearl Drop
materials: Natural Emeralds (Oval & Pear Cut - 6.38 carats total)
features: This exquisite necklace showcases a modern interpretation of the traditional Kasu Haaram. Features intricately crafted gold paisley motifs set with sparkling Polki diamonds. Highlights include two vibrant, centrally placed Emeralds, with a larger pear-shaped emerald in a floral motif pendant, and a delicate South Sea pearl drop, adding a touch of sophistication. The setting style is a classic closed setting for the Polki diamonds, enhancing their natural brilliance.
description: A stunning fusion of tradition and contemporary design. This Kasu Haaram is a statement piece that embodies timeless elegance. The use of natural Emeralds and South Sea Pearl adds value and sophistication. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and featuring the renowned Hyderabadi polish, this necklace is a true heirloom piece. The Lakshmi Kasu design is believed to bring prosperity and good fortune.
